name: Dumb soccer
description:
Dumb soccer

Dumb soccer is a game that can be played by two players on a same computer. The goal is to score a goal but it is not as easy as it might seem because the controls are quite goofy.

Web version

Due to a bug in Godot4 beta or Firefox, the game will not start in Firefox. To play it, please use a chromium based browser such as Chrome, Edge or Brave for example.

Controls

Controllers are partially supported. they should work fine but it has not been tested extensively.

Player 1
  • W: Jump
  • A: Left
  • D: Right
Player2
  • Up: Jump
  • Left: Left
  • Right: Right
